title: American_Top_40_1971_March_13th
description:
American Top 40 with Casey Kasem aired on radio from July 4, 1970 until August 6, 1988. This is a recording of a rebroadcast from internet radio.

In this broadcast:

As of this broadcast, only two acts have ever been able to win record-of-the-year twice, and they're both in this countdown.

One song in the countdown has lyrics that are 200 years old.

One singer in the countdown had three network television shows cancelled on him while he was getting more fan mail than anyone else at the network.

Number eight is a double sided hit and it is by Creedence Clearwater Revival, and at number seven is a remake of a CCR hit by Ike & Tina Turner. That's CCR cubed!
